long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you like Animal crossing? Are you away from Animal crossing, or miss your childhood memories of animal crossing Well then this is the extension for you! This is an animal crossing Live background. It has many Animal crossing characters, icon, and objects to display every time you open a new tab! This live wallpaper extension gives you a different Animal crossing character, object to look at each time,these fun adorable characters from Animal crossing are nice to look at and of course cute! They provide a sense that you are playing Animal crossing, even when your away from you 3DS, DS, Game Cube, or Wii! 

The pictures do not do it justice! These pictures are pictures and cannot show moving things. To get the full effect Download this extension today!

This extension works well with the animal crossing music extension!
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/animal-crossing-music/ldjcaihhhmemeidcfbcadilcmfdaikkg
